title: Herrin Police Searching for ATM Vandals
text:
Herrin Police Searching for ATM Vandals Tools 
Story Created: Oct 1, 2015 at 7:36   Oct 1, 2015 at 7:43 PM CDT 
WILLIAMSON CO. -- Herrin Police are seeking help in tracking down two people who caused major damage to an ATM at a local bank. On September 18, a surveillance camera captured two people at the ATM outside of the First Southern Bank in Herrin. Police say one of the people struck the machine with his fist, causing several thousands of dollars worth of damage to its display screen. Anyone with information on the identity of these individuals is asked to call Herrin Police at (618) 942-4132
